metadata.title: CVE-2021-3693 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: LedgerSMB does not check the origin of HTML fragments merged into the browser's DOM. By sending a specially crafted URL to an authenticated user, this flaw can be abused for remote code execution and information disclosure.

criterions.comment: ledgersmb package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
